title: Analysis of the adhesion mechanism of functionalized carbon nanotubes by molecular dynamics simulation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21425-21431
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02964J, Paper

Mingyue Lu, Yanyan Wu, Yang Li, Li Ding, Zhendong Dai, Qinming Gu
Although a lot of research has been carried out on the adhesion mechanism of gecko bristles, the research on the adhesion mechanism of materials inspired by gecko bristles is still unclear.
